bug.author: ishahaad
bug.description: Hello Flair team, I used to use flair just fine on my old machine and created multiple models. Now when I moved to my new machine,e I installed flair, and I'm trying to load a previous model, but I encountered an error "ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'pytorch_transformers'". So I pip install pytorch_transformers, then another error came up "ModuleNotFoundError: No module named '_regex'". I'm not sure how to solve it. Please I need your help Thank you

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
